Einstein Bros. Bagels
Las Vegas, Nevada, United States 4626 South Maryland Pkwy Las Vegas, Nevada, United States 89119 702-795-7800 www.einsteinbros.com View Map Overall Experience: 8 / 10 Date Visited: Friday, October 12, 2007 Visited: Breakfast Seating: Indoor Seating Area Einstein Bagels is a chain of breakfast fast food restaurants. They offer bagels and bagel sandwiches at affordable prices. This particular store is located across from the University of Nevada, Las Vegas.
At Einstein Bagels, you give them your name when placing your order, and then move to the payment line. When paying, they ask your name, and confirm your order for you. I like how this system tries to help eliminate ordering mistakes.
Dress
Shorts and a t-shirt are acceptable.
Reservations
It's a fast food restaurant - reservations aren't available or needed.
Cost
Fairly affordable - a toasted bagel is $1.49
Items Ordered
Sesame Seed Bagel Sesame Seed Bagel Cost: $1.49 The bagel was toasted and buttered (somewhat irregularly). There was nothing notable about it - it was a typical toasted sesame seed bagel.
Asiago Cheese Pretzel Asiago Cheese Pretzel Cost: $1.99 Pretzels are always fun, especially a pretzel with asiago cheese on top. This pretzel was served toasted/warm.
Freshly Squeezed Orange Juice Freshly Squeezed Orange Juice Cost: $3.49 This was a fairly large glass of orange juice - it was quite good, and a reasonable value at $3.49.
